summary_1: In this section, the speaker discusses the coding habits they would inculcate in 2023. They suggest not being afraid of any framework or language, spending more time in the terminal, and learning Git and GitHub. They demonstrate how to use the terminal to play a video, create a folder, and push a file to GitHub. They also suggest contributing to open source projects.
summary_2: In this section, the speaker talks about how to use Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment (CICD) to deploy a website, how to contribute to open source projects, how to be part of the right community, and how to maintain a reading list of blog posts and open source it. He also encourages viewers to get out of their comfort zone and try new technologies to achieve their goals.
summary_of_summaries: This video discusses coding habits to adopt in 2023, such as not being afraid of any framework or language, spending more time in the terminal, learning Git and GitHub, and contributing to open source projects. It also covers topics such as Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment (CICD), how to contribute to open source projects, how to be part of the right community, and how to maintain a reading list of blog posts and open source it. The speaker encourages viewers to get out of their comfort zone and try new technologies to achieve their goals.
